tool_description:
The VAT API offers precise and accurate VAT price calculations, instant EU VAT number validation with extraction of the business/company details from the VIES database (including those for Northern Ireland starting with XI post Brexit) and VAT rates for 32 countries (all of the 30 EEA countries plus those for Switzerland and United Kingdom).
The team is working to release additional endpoints very soon.
name: VAT API
title: VAT API

api_list.name: All VAT rates for a specific country
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all VAT rates (standard and reduced) for a specific country by using the country code. Country codes are AT, BE, BG, HR, CY, CZ, DK, EE, FI, FR, DE, EL, HU,  IS, IE, IT, LV, LI, LT, LU, MT, NL, NO, PL, PT, RO, SK, SI, ES, SE, CH and GB.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://vat-api1.p.rapidapi.com/api/rates/it"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "vat-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://vat-api1.p.rapidapi.com/api/rates/{country_code}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "vat-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: All VAT rates by category for a specific country
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all VAT rates per category of goods/services and the related details for a specific country by using the country code. Country codes are AT, BE, BG, HR, CY, CZ, DK, EE, FI, FR, DE, EL, HU, IE, IT, LV, LT, LU, MT, NL, PL, PT, RO, SK, SI, ES, SE and GB.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://vat-api1.p.rapidapi.com/api/categories/it"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://vat-api1.p.rapidapi.com/api/categories/{country_code}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

api_list.name: Validate EU VAT Number (Option 3)
api_list.description: This endpoint will return the date and time of the request, whether the VAT number is valid and the company details (name and address) for a specific VAT number. Country codes (used as prefix of the VAT number) must be included. These are AT, BE, BG, HR, CY, CZ, DK, EE, FI, FR, DE, EL, HU, IE, IT, LV, LT, LU, MT, NL, PL, PT, RO, SK, SI, ES, SE and XI (XI = Northern Ireland post Brexit).
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://vat-api1.p.rapidapi.com/api/validate/IT04231750151"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "vat-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://vat-api1.p.rapidapi.com/api/validate/{vatid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "vat-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
